poster: C Ã© l e s t i a
title: Custom announcer pack
body: I  use to have a custom announcer pack for league but once the patch 7.14 got in it went to the original announcer for the game. Is there any way I can put my old one back?

replies.body: We don't support third party programs or modifications, so I wouldn't really know how to assist you with this.  I'd have to suggest not using these programs because they can cause issues like crashes, or even hide malicious content.  Check out our [third party program guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and use caution!
